title: Disenchant
body: Was opening a champion box from my final chest with project tokens and disenchanted the 1 champ i want, Corki. Did this by accident is there anyway I can redo it. Help is appreciated, completely by accident and don't want to spend 2500 extra blue essence.

replies.body:
No worries! Since this just happened and it looks like an obvious mistake I've gone ahead and reversed that for ya.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5ckA5Wzi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-27T02:13:56.427+0000)
